definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The burn-out accident occurred several times in operation of dry type hollow shunt reactor.
sentences.chinese: 乾式空心並聯電抗器在運行中曾發生多起燒損事故。

sentences.english: Commutated reactance is an important parameter in HVDC transmission system.
sentences.chinese: 換相電抗是高壓直流輸電系統中的一項重要技術參數。

sentences.english: The application of new-type reactor in the electric power system is expounded.
sentences.chinese: 詳述了新型電抗器在電力系統中的應用。

sentences.english: Air-core power reactor has been important equipment in power system at the present time.
sentences.chinese: 空心電力電抗器目前已經成爲電力系統中的重要設備。

sentences.english: The study on simulation model of 12-pulse transformation rectifier with equilibrium reactor was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了帶均衡電抗器的12脈波變壓整流器仿真模型。

sentences.english: The parameters of neutral reactor for HV shunt reactors and the line ground switch are selected.
sentences.chinese: 選擇了高抗中性點小電抗和線路接地刀閘的參數。

sentences.english: A new directional element based on the fault component positive sequence reactance (FCPSR) is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於故障分量正序電抗的方向元件。

sentences.english: Phaseshifting reactor is a new method for converter power supply systems harmonic suppression.
sentences.chinese: 移相電抗器是變流器供電系統諧波抑制的一種新方法。

sentences.english: Capacitor banks with various reactance ratio have different functions to harmonic.
sentences.chinese: 不同電抗率的電容器組對諧波有不同的作用。
